content: Not sure if we have any IHE folk on here. If we do, does anybody know of any plans to refactor PDQM (http://www.ihe.net/uploadedFiles/Documents/ITI/IHE_ITI_Suppl_PDQm.pdf) on to DSTU2?

During the European Connectathon 2016, we used a ballot version of the profile based on FHIR DSTU2 v1.0.2, same with PIXm.
Here is a link to the ballot:
ftp://ftp.ihe.net/IT_Infrastructure/TF_Maintenance-2016/CPs/Ballots/ballot_32/IHE_ITI_Suppl_PDQm_20160219-Ballot32.docx

IHE will be publishing an updated version of the one provided for the European Connectathon. I think the schedule for official publication is later this summer, however I believe the approved text was circulated yesterday on the IHE ITI technical mailing list.
And then we can start updating for STU3.
